NameFlagsCard.TypeDescription & Constraints
Condition 0..* ConditionUvIps Documentation of a health problem of the patient
clinicalStatus 1..1 CodeableConceptIPS Concept - reference to a terminology or just text
Binding: Condition Clinical Status Codes (required)
category 0..* CodeableConceptIPS Concept - reference to a terminology or just text
Binding: Problem Type - IPS (extensible)
Additional BindingsPurpose
Problem Type (LOINC) candidate

severity 0..1 CodeableConceptIPS Concept - reference to a terminology or just text
Binding: Condition/DiagnosisSeverity (preferred)
coding 0..1 CodingIPS A reference to a code defined by a terminology system
system Σ 0..1 uri Identity of the terminology system
Required Pattern: http://snomed.info/sct
code Σ 0..1 code Symbol in syntax defined by the system
Binding: Severity Value Set (extensible)
display Σ 0..1 string Representation defined by the system
text Σ 0..1 string Plain text representation of the concept
code 1..1 CodeableConceptIPS Concept - reference to a terminology or just text
Binding: Problems - IPS (preferred): Code for a clinical problem (or absent/unknown problem) that is selected from SNOMED CT

bodySite 0..* CodeableConceptIPS Concept - reference to a terminology or just text
Binding: SNOMEDCTBodyStructures (example)
coding 0..1 CodingIPS A reference to a code defined by a terminology system
system Σ 0..1 uri Identity of the terminology system
Required Pattern: http://snomed.info/sct
code Σ 0..1 code Symbol in syntax defined by the system
display Σ 0..1 string Representation defined by the system
text Σ 0..1 string Plain text representation of the concept
subject Σ 1..1 Reference(RareLink IPS Patient) Who has the condition?
reference ΣC 1..1 string Literal reference, Relative, internal or absolute URL
identifier Σ 0..1 Identifier Logical reference, when literal reference is not known

Slice: Unordered, Open by type:$this
onsetDateTime dateTime
